verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God נִצָּ֥ב <S%H5324><s%> standeth בַּעֲדַת־ <S%H5712><s%> in the congregation אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> of the mighty בְּקֶ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> among אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> the gods יִשְׁפֹּֽט׃ <S%H8199><s%> he judgeth

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> How תִּשְׁפְּטוּ־ <S%H8199><s%> How long will ye judge עָ֑וֶל <S%H5766><s%> unjustly וּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> the persons רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> wicked תִּשְׂאוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> and accept סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

שִׁפְטוּ־ <S%H8199><s%> Defend דַ֥ל <S%H1800><s%> the poor וְיָת֑וֹם <S%H3490><s%> and fatherless עָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> to the afflicted וָרָ֣שׁ <S%H7326><s%> and needy הַצְדִּֽיקוּ׃ <S%H6663><s%> do justice

פַּלְּטוּ־ <S%H6403><s%> Deliver דַ֥ל <S%H1800><s%> the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> and needy מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> [them] out of the hand רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked הַצִּֽילוּ׃ <S%H5337><s%> rid

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָֽדְע֨וּ ׀ <S%H3045><s%> They know וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָבִ֗ינוּ <S%H995><s%> not neither will they understand בַּחֲשֵׁכָ֥ה <S%H2825><s%> on in darkness יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> they walk יִ֝מּ֗וֹטוּ <S%H4131><s%> are out of course כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מ֥וֹסְדֵי <S%H4144><s%> all the foundations אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I have said אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> Ye [are] gods אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> of you וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> and all of you [are] children עֶלְי֣וֹן <S%H5945><s%> of the most High כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> and all

אָ֭כֵן <S%H403><s%> But כְּאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> like men תְּמוּת֑וּן <S%H4191><s%> ye shall die וּכְאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> like one הַשָּׂרִ֣ים <S%H8269><s%> of the princes תִּפֹּֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> and fall

קוּמָ֣ה <S%H6965><s%> Arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God שָׁפְטָ֣ה <S%H8199><s%> judge הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> who תִ֝נְחַ֗ל <S%H5157><s%> for thou shalt inherit בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> all nations
